update t_chemicals set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_cn = #{nameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_cn = #{aliasCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cas = #{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, molecular_formula = #{molecularFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, molecular_weight = #{molecularWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appearance = #{appearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = leakage = #{leakage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_attention = #{storageAttention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_limit = #{contactLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCXZS = #{jcxzs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCXZTWA = #{jcxztwa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCXZSTEL = #{jcxzstel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDLH = #{idlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engineering_control = #{engineeringControl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, respiratory_protection = #{respiratoryProtection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eye_protection = #{eyeProtection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, body_protection = #{bodyProtection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taboo = #{taboo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_touch = #{dangerousNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, un_num = #{unNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dangerous_package = #{dangerousPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_type = #{packageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iso = #{iso,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disposition_num = #{dispositionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, alias_en = #{aliasEn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, solubility = outfire = #{outfire,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, hand_protection = #{handProtection,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, other = #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, stability = #{stability,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

#{molecularFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, molecular_weight = #{molecularWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appearance = #{appearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = mapper.select:
SELECT c.id,c.name_cn,c.name_en,c.cas,c.molecular_formula from t_chemicals c WHERE 1=1
AND c.name_cn LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.name}),'%')
AND c.status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.status}),'%')
AND c.color LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.color}),'%')
AND c.smell LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.smell}),'%')
AND c.taste LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.taste}),'%')
AND c.proportion_air LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.specific_air}),'%')
AND c.proportion_water LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.specific_water}),'%')
AND c.ph LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.ph}),'%')
AND c.transparency LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.transparency}),'%')
AND c.nervous_system LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.nervous}),'%')
AND c.eyes LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.eye}),'%')
AND c.ears LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.ear}),'%')
AND c.mouth LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.mouth_throat}),'%')
AND c.cardiovascular LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.cardiovascular}),'%')
AND c.respiratory_system LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.respiratory}),'%')
AND c.gastric_system LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.gastro_urinary}),'%')
AND c.skin LIKE concat(concat('%',#{request.skin}),'%')

SELECT c.smell AS 01气味, c.saturated AS 01饱和蒸气压／温度, c.taste AS 01味道, c.color AS 01颜色, c.explosion_u AS 01爆炸上限, c.explosion_d as 01爆炸下限, c.critical_pressure AS 01临界压力, c.critical_temperature as 01临界温度, c.transparency as 01透明度, c.relative_air as '01相对气度(空气=1)', c.relative_density as '01相对密度(水=1)', c.natural_temperature as 01自然温度, c.appearance as 01外观于形状, c.boiling_point as 01沸点, c.proportion_air as 01比重, c.ph as 01PH值, c.melting_point as 01熔点, c.`status` as 01状态, c.explosion_u as 01爆炸上限, c.flash_point as 01闪点, c.dangerous_type as 02危险源类别, c.health_hazards as 02健康危害, c.eye_contact as 03眼睛接触, c.suction as 03食入, c.skin_contact as 03皮肤接触, c.inspiroation as 03吸入, c.dangerous_characteristics as 04危险特性, c.outfire as 04灭火方法, c.leakage as 05泄漏处置, c.storage_attention as 06储运注意事项, c.hand_protection as 07手防护, c.engineering_control as 07工程控制, c.respiratory_protection as 07呼吸系统防护, c.other as 07其它, c.body_protection as 07身体防护, c.eye_protection as 07眼睛防护, c.contact_limit as 07健康接触限值, c.stability as 08稳定性和反应活性, c.toxicity as 09毒性, c.trecs as 09RTECS编号, c.dangerous_num as 10危险货物编号, c.package_type as 11包装类别, c.un_num as 11UN编号, c.dangerous_package as 11危险货物包装标志, c.iso as 11ISO, c.disposition_num as 11处置方案编号
FROM t_chemicals c WHERE id=${id}
